pr_title: Participant Manager : Fixed issue #1322, For addNewParticipants, inviteParticipants, importParticipants, updateOnboardingStatus and consentDocument API

timeline.bodyText: I see that this check is being repeated a lot in one file. A suggestion is to create a helper method and call it something like validateUserId
timeline.author: saminguyen

timeline.bodyText: test cases for Super Admin == true. Also test cases for USER_NOT_FOUND exception
timeline.author: saminguyen

replies.bodyText: Superadmin will be having all the apps, studies and site level permissions, so access denied error is not applicable for super admin. I have written test case for USER_NOT_FOUND exception.
replies.author: monica-BTC

timeline.bodyText: nit: Can we make this a common helper method for all Service Impl classes? Other Services like Study, App, etc are also doing the same check. No need to fix this in this CL, just a code cleanup suggestion
timeline.author: saminguyen

replies.bodyText: Thanks for the suggestion, we will do it in follow up PR
